technology.name: Vicious Lash
technology.description: Few sounds thrill like the crack of a whip, promising both pain and pleasure.

effects.description: Melee attack: +1 per experience rank for all Hellscourge units
Bonus vs Infantry: +8 for all Hellscourge units (rank 4 and above)

technology.name: Flesh-Bound Book
technology.description: A weathered book of spells holds the secrets of Slaanesh, bound in delicate, unblemished flesh.

effects.description: Enables Soporific Musk attacks for Aspiring Champions and Chosen of Slaanesh
Cooldown: -10% to Lore of Slaanesh and Shadow spells

technology.name: Vows of Excess
technology.description: Slaanesh shares in all manner of delights, for those willing to wholly give themselves over to His whims.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Slaanesh
Army ability: "Narcissism"

technology.name: Summons of Slaanesh
technology.description: With the favour of Slaanesh comes command over His forces, calling the vicious Daemonettes to battle.

effects.description: Gifted Units pool capacity: +3 for Daemonettes units
Gifted Units pool capacity: +3 for Seeker Chariots units

technology.name: Pleasure Altars
technology.description: Mortals prostrate themselves at the altars of Slaanesh, empowered by the ecstasy of His favour.

effects.description:
Speed: +5% for all units for each active Gift of Slaanesh
	(all armies)

Path to Glory: -15% Souls cost to devote to Slaanesh
	(all characters)

technology.name: Daemon Mounts
technology.description: Daemonic steeds are driven by unnatural hunger, carrying mortals sworn to Chaos into battle in search of prey.

effects.description: Unlocks Warband upgrades: Gorebeast Chariots, Doom Knights and Skullcrushers
Unit experience gain: +15% for Chaos Knights

technology.name: Urgent Whispers
technology.description: The Prince of Chaos lives in the heart of mortal men, urging them to fight harder in His name.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Soul Hunters" for Aspiring Champions and Chaos Knights of Slaanesh units

ui_effects.description: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.
Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.

effects.description: Vigour loss reduction: -35% for all cavalry and chariots with the Mark of Slaanesh

technology.name: Rite of Ascension
technology.description: The dark rites must be performed, if the chosen are to rise among the ranks of Ruin.

effects.description: Unlocks Warband upgrades: Chosen
Unit experience gain: +15% for Chaos Warriors

technology.name: Profane Weaponry
technology.description: The arms of a Chaos Knight are imbued with a small but not inconsequential amount of Unholy power.

effects.description: Unlocks Warband upgrades: Chaos Knights
Enables magical attacks for Chaos Knights units

technology.name: Inscribed Chaos Armour
technology.description: Chaos Armour, inscribed with powerful litanies of hate, will glow hot and vengeful when struck.

effects.description: Unit Upgrades cost: -15% for all units
Armour: +5 for Chaos Warriors, Chosen, Chaos Knights and Aspiring Champion units

technology.name: Dark Diplomacy
technology.description: All the forces of Chaos must unite, if the scourge of Order is to ever be undone.

effects.description: Allegiance points gained: +25% for alliances and vassalage with Skaven, Beastmen and Norsca
Diplomatic relations: +15 with Skaven, Norsca and Beastmen for each active Gift of Chaos Undivided

technology.name: Unchained Beasts
technology.description: A worthy Beastmaster needs no chains to direct the ferocious nature of his darling pets.

effects.description: Melee attack: +8 for Chaos Warhounds and Feral Manticore units
Passive ability: "Gorefeast" for Chaos Warhounds and Feral Manticore units (Rank 4 and above)

technology.name: Sensuous Branding Iron
technology.description: The brand of Slaanesh always stings, evoking wanton pleasure from pain.

effects.description: Leadership: +5 for Marauders of Slaanesh, Marauders of Slaanesh (Hellscourges), Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh, Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh (Hellscourges), Chosen of Slaanesh, Chosen of Slaanesh (Hellscourges), Chaos Knights of Slaanesh, and Chaos Knights of Slaanesh (Lances) units

Charge Bonus: +5 for Marauders of Slaanesh, Marauders of Slaanesh (Hellscourges), Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh, Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh (Hellscourges), Chosen of Slaanesh, Chosen of Slaanesh (Hellscourges), Chaos Knights of Slaanesh, and Chaos Knights of Slaanesh (Lances) units

Melee Attack: +5 for Marauders of Slaanesh, Marauders of Slaanesh (Hellscourges), Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh, Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh (Hellscourges), Chosen of Slaanesh, Chosen of Slaanesh (Hellscourges), Chaos Knights of Slaanesh, and Chaos Knights of Slaanesh (Lances) units

Armour: +5 for Marauders of Slaanesh, Marauders of Slaanesh (Hellscourges), Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh, Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh (Hellscourges), Chosen of Slaanesh, Chosen of Slaanesh (Hellscourges), Chaos Knights of Slaanesh, and Chaos Knights of Slaanesh (Lances) units
Warband upgrades: Allows Undivided units to receive the Mark of Slaanesh
Attribute: Immune to Psychology for Aspiring Champions
Attribute: Strider for Aspiring Champions

Stat Boost: Marauders of Slaanesh, Marauders of Slaanesh (Hellscourges), Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh, Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh (Hellscourges), Chosen of Slaanesh, Chosen of Slaanesh (Hellscourges), Chaos Knights of Slaanesh, and Chaos Knights of Slaanesh (Lances) units

technology.name: Echo Chamber
technology.description: The screams of every sacrifice ring out for miles, their agony like music of inspiration.

effects.description: Slaanesh Authority: +1 for each active Gift of Slaanesh

technology.name: Scrutiny of the Dark Gods
technology.description: Let the Marauders gather under their Dark Masters' eternal gaze.

effects.description: Armour: +8 for Marauders of Nurgle, Marauders of Nurgle (Great Weapons), Chaos Warriors of Nurgle, Chaos Warriors of Nurgle (Great Weapons), Chosen of Nurgle, Chosen of Nurgle (Great Weapons), Chaos Knights of Nurgle, and Chaos Knights of nurgle (Lances) units

Leadership: +6 for Marauders of Nurgle, Marauders of Nurgle (Great Weapons), Chaos Warriors of Nurgle, Chaos Warriors of Nurgle (Great Weapons), Chosen of Nurgle, Chosen of Nurgle (Great Weapons), Chaos Knights of Nurgle, and Chaos Knights of nurgle (Lances) units

Weapon Defence: +6 for Marauders of Nurgle, Marauders of Nurgle (Great Weapons), Chaos Warriors of Nurgle, Chaos Warriors of Nurgle (Great Weapons), Chosen of Nurgle, Chosen of Nurgle (Great Weapons), Chaos Knights of Nurgle, and Chaos Knights of nurgle (Lances) units

Weapon Strength: +8% for Marauders of Nurgle, Marauders of Nurgle (Great Weapons), Chaos Warriors of Nurgle, Chaos Warriors of Nurgle (Great Weapons), Chosen of Nurgle, Chosen of Nurgle (Great Weapons), Chaos Knights of Nurgle, and Chaos Knights of nurgle (Lances) units
Charge Bonus: +5 for Marauders of Khorne, Marauders of Khorne (Dual Weapons), Chaos Knights of Khorne, and Chaos Knights of Khorne (Lances) units
Leadership: +6 for Marauders of Khorne, Marauders of Khorne (Dual Weapons), Chaos Knights of Khorne, and Chaos Knights of Khorne (Lances) units
Speed: +5% for Marauders of Khorne, Marauders of Khorne (Dual Weapons), Chaos Knights of Khorne, and Chaos Knights of Khorne (Lances) units
Melee Attack: +5 for Marauders of Khorne, Marauders of Khorne (Dual Weapons), Chaos Knights of Khorne, and Chaos Knights of Khorne (Lances) units

Leadership: +5 for Marauders of Slaanesh, Marauders of Slaanesh (Hellscourges), Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh, Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh (Hellscourges), Chosen of Slaanesh, Chosen of Slaanesh (Hellscourges), Chaos Knights of Slaanesh, and Chaos Knights of Slaanesh (Lances) units

Charge Bonus: +5 for Marauders of Slaanesh, Marauders of Slaanesh (Hellscourges), Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh, Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh (Hellscourges), Chosen of Slaanesh, Chosen of Slaanesh (Hellscourges), Chaos Knights of Slaanesh, and Chaos Knights of Slaanesh (Lances) units

Melee Attack: +5 for Marauders of Slaanesh, Marauders of Slaanesh (Hellscourges), Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh, Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh (Hellscourges), Chosen of Slaanesh, Chosen of Slaanesh (Hellscourges), Chaos Knights of Slaanesh, and Chaos Knights of Slaanesh (Lances) units

Armour: +5 for Marauders of Slaanesh, Marauders of Slaanesh (Hellscourges), Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh, Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh (Hellscourges), Chosen of Slaanesh, Chosen of Slaanesh (Hellscourges), Chaos Knights of Slaanesh, and Chaos Knights of Slaanesh (Lances) units
Armour: +6 for Marauders of Tzeentch, Marauders of Tzeentch (Spears), and Chaos Knights of Tzeentch (Lances) units
Leadership: +8 for Marauders of Tzeentch, Marauders of Tzeentch (Spears), and Chaos Knights of Tzeentch (Lances) units
Melee Attack: +5 for Marauders of Tzeentch, Marauders of Tzeentch (Spears), and Chaos Knights of Tzeentch (Lances) units
Weapon Defence: +6 for Marauders of Tzeentch, Marauders of Tzeentch (Spears), and Chaos Knights of Tzeentch (Lances) units
Unit experience gain: +25% for Marauders

technology.name: Charioteer
technology.description: Engineers have perfected a wicked machine of war, drawn by fearsome steeds into the very heart of battle.

effects.description: Unlocks Warband upgrades: Chaos Chariots and Hellstriders
Unit experience gain: +25% for Marauder Horsemen

technology.name: Daemonic Pact
technology.description: A pact with the Dark Gods should not be taken lightly.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Chaos Undivided
Attribute: Cause Fear for Aspiring Champions and Undivided Chosen units

All Authority: +1
	(all armies)

technology.name: Giant Manacles
technology.description: Such massive iron bands are a marvel to behold, lending strength to the swing of the most colossal creatures.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +8% for Chaos Trolls and Chaos Giant units
Missile resistance: 25% for Chaos Trolls and Chaos Giant units (Rank 4 and above)

technology.name: Gaze of the Dark Gods
technology.description: All hope to catch the attention of the Gods, gathering where they think the Ruinous Powers will be looking.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Chaos Undivided
Attribute: Perfect Vigour for Aspiring Champions and Undivided Chosen units

All Authority: +1
	(all armies)

technology.name: Blessings of Slaanesh
technology.description: Azazel reaps the rewards of his service, touched by the overwhelming presence of his Prince.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Slaanesh
Passive ability: "Feasting on Fear" for Aspiring Champions units

ui_effects.description: Effect intensity increases by each enemy unit in range with leadership wavering or lower.

technology.name: Daemonic Aid
technology.description: The Daemons of Slaanesh are drawn in by the irresistible allure of Azazel's countenance.

effects.description: Gifted Units pool capacity: +3 for Keeper of Secrets units
Seduce Units budget: +100%
Path to Glory: -15% Souls cost to upgrade characters to a Daemon Prince of Slaanesh

technology.name: Infernal March
technology.description: The Chaos Gods grow impatient. Lending a sliver of majesty, they enable their followers to march faster.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5%
Battle reinforcement time: -50%

technology.name: Erection of Ruinous Monuments
technology.description: Tributes and monuments to the Dark Powers ensure the Chaos Gods' favour.

effects.description: Unlocks Hero recruitment and post-battle loot bonus effects for Altar Improvement buildings
Construction time: -10% for all buildings

technology.name: A Thousand Twisted Blessings
technology.description: Such a generous gift is the thousand twisted blessings. Think of all the needle-teeth and tentacles it bestows.

effects.description: Unlocks Warband upgrades: Forsaken
Attribute: Cause Terror for Chaos Spawn units

technology.name: Malignant Totems
technology.description: Unholy tributes and towering monuments ensure the Chaos Gods' favour.

effects.description: Lord recruit rank: +4
Chaos corruption: +2 for each active Gift of Chaos Undivided

technology.name: Culling of the Weak
technology.description: Stragglers will not be entertained. If you can't keep the pace, you are food for the Warhounds.

effects.description: Souls gained from battles: +20%

technology.name: Corrupted Offerings
technology.description: Souls are sent to Slaanesh alongside idols of corruption, allowing His influence to seep into the mortal plane.

effects.description: Slaanesh corruption: +2 from Chaos Altars
Slaanesh corruption: +2 for each active Gift of Slaanesh

technology.name: Slaves to Darkness
technology.description: Perhaps the threat of a collar and chain would remind these lesser beings of their place.

effects.description: Request army cost: -25%
War co-ordination target cost: -25%

technology.name: Unholy Aid
technology.description: A hypnotic trance falls upon the enemies of Slaanesh, when He reaches in and plucks at their deepest desires.

effects.description: Souls from enemy characters granted the Gift of Slaanesh: +25

technology.name: Debauched Designs
technology.description: The Pleasure Houses are rife with debauchery under Azazel's keen instruction.

effects.description: Unlocks Warband upgrade cost reduction effect for Dark Fortress military buildings

technology.name: Sensuous Gifts
technology.description: The Prince of Pleasure rewards His faithful well, offering decadent reward for their service.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Slaanesh
Army ability: "Sweet Sorrow"

technology.name: Herald of Sacrifice
technology.description: A herald travels far and wide, sharing word of every soul sacrificed in Slaanesh's name.

effects.description: Allegiance points gained: +25% for alliances and vassalage with Slaanesh
Diplomatic relations: +15 with Slaaneshi factions for each active Gift of Slaanesh

technology.name: Sensation's Call
technology.description: Those marked by Slaanesh answer the call, summoned to serve at His champion's behest.

effects.description: Path to Glory: +50% levels kept when devoting a character to Slaanesh
Hero capacity: +2 for Chaos Sorcerers
Enables direct recruitment of Marked Chaos Sorcerers
